name: Nike Air Max 90
description: Iconic lifestyle sneaker with visible Air cushioning and retro design.
reviews_summary: Customers love the classic design. Very comfortable for daily wear.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 23
description: High-performance running shoe with Boost midsole for energy return.
reviews_summary: Top-tier running shoe. Excellent cushioning and responsiveness.

name: New Balance 990v6
description: Premium made-in-USA lifestyle shoe with superior comfort.
reviews_summary: The gold standard of comfort. Worth every penny.

name: Nike Pegasus 41
description: Versatile daily running shoe with React foam and Air Zoom unit.
reviews_summary: Great all-around running shoe. Reliable and comfortable.

name: Adidas Samba OG
description: Classic indoor soccer shoe turned lifestyle icon.
reviews_summary: Timeless style. Goes with everything. Sells out fast.
